programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

programme.title: RONDA ARTÍSTICA

programme.title: The Student of Prague (1926)
programme.desc: For Balduin, going out to beer parties with his fellow students and fighting out disputes at the tip of the sword have lost their charms. He wants to find love; but how would he, a penniless student, ever dare looking up to any woman worth of loving? Absorbed in his dreary thoughts and indifferent to the advances of Lyduschka, Balduin is unexpectedly offered a fortune by the mysterious money-lender Scapinelli - but on a strange condition...

programme.title: Silent Supper
programme.desc: Dede attends the silent supper, a ritual the single Bayou women conduct to foresee their future husbands. Old voodoo woman Miss Watkins had told Dede that she'd meet her husband at the supper that night. Miss Watkins has the misfortune of meeting up with troublemaker Jean Duval, who stabs her and steals her silver. Then, uninvited, he crashes the silent supper.

programme.title: Wot A Night (1931)
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tom and Jerry, two ambitious cab drivers, wait outside a train station for fares. When two strange men in top hats disembark from their train, the hacks solicit them until they give in and ask for a ride to their castle. When the men stiff the fare, Tom and Jerry pursue them, only to be trapped inside the castle by a portcullis. They wander about the residence and encounter a fearsome-looking bat, a bathing, whistling skeleton, a veritable army of ghosts, and other assorted ghouls and goblins. After meeting a skeletal quartet in black-face, they find the two strange men again and discover they've been turned into skeletons as well, after which they escape the castle and run for their lives.

programme.desc: A determined team stands ready to protect Dr. Kettle and his followers from a menacing robot. Bee and Bo remain vigilant at the water tower as the others take their positions. Armed with Dr. Kettles advanced gadgets and electroshockers, the team is prepared to fight with all their might. Red Riding Hood issues a warning about the Wolf and Hyenas, and Slowie and Honey stay behind to hold their ground. They are a united front, ready to face any challenge that comes their way.

programme.title: Tornado Accelerators
programme.desc: By performing good deeds, many strive to obtain the coveted Super Tornado Accelerators from the esteemed Accelerate Man. Cyclone is determined to gain an edge over Flame by doing as many good deeds as possible, but his efforts result in a series of unfortunate events. Can Flame rise to the challenge and resolve these issues, ultimately earning possession of the Super Tornado Accelerators?

programme.title: Airship of Dreams
programme.desc: Can the Q-Star League overcome the challenge of stopping Cyclone from hijacking Q-Towns beloved airship? As the Buster Gang plots their next move, they must remember that true success comes from honest and fair actions. Let us believe in the power of doing what is right and standing up for what we believe in. Together, we can achieve anything we set our minds to.

programme.title: DISCIPLINE
programme.desc: A series of murders are confounding the local police with its residue of mutilated corpses. It begins when a sadistic cult murders willing victims for entertainment. Professor Lafitte, a rich sophisticated man, whose hobby is collecting souls, leads the cult. One of his students is Jack, brilliant and obsessed with composing avant-grade music. He decides to compose a concerto for synthesizer & samplers that is based on the recorded sound of human screams. Jack is drawn into the clutches of the professor, who is guiding him into a dark path of self discovery, in his attempt to create a new kind of music. In his quest for this new kind of music, he begins to seek out human pain. The professor leads Jack into his much more dangerous private activities. Jacks girlfriend Claudia and his best friend Benny are journalists for the collage newspaper and are covering a series of bizarre murders and mutilations that has the police stumped. Benny finally discovers that there is a connection between the murders, the professor and Jack, just as Jack and Professor Lafiette and his diabolical servants are threatening Claudias lives. The final scene threatens not only Jacks creativity, but also his very life.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 34
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: History of Ma.Po.Si
programme.desc: Mylai Ponnuswamy Sivagnanam, popularly known as Ma.Po.Si, was an Indian politician, freedom fighter, and the founder of the political party Tamil Arasu Kazhagam who has written more than 100 books.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 13
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Never approached dad for an acting opportunity - Shruti Haasan Exclusive Interview
programme.desc: Shruti Haasan is an Indian actress and playback singer who primarily works in Telugu, Hindi, and Tamil films. She is a recipient of several accolades including two Filmfare Award South and three South Indian International Movie Awards. She has appeared in Forbes Indias Celebrity 100 list of 2015 and 2016.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Universal Remote
programme.desc: A mishap with electricity converts Colonel into a remote controlled dog. And Charly, Marly and Larry exploit the situation to the maximum, making poor Colonel their remote controlled puppet. But nothing is forever, now it is time the trio came into Colonel’s shoes bu ha ha ha…

programme.title: Wheres Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: YesYouCan
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: The south-bound Swallow sits on the Happy Prince statue. However, unlike its name the Prince statue is crying. The Swallow postpones his trip and decides to help the Prince.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: ABC Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: Pizza Box
programme.desc: After a nice hearty meal, lets get DIY-ing with Hepi and Briko

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Burping Boulders
programme.desc: Afraid of the loud thunder in the waking world, Maple discovers in the Zooniverse that Ene fears something too - the mysterious and loud burping boulders. Together they go on a journey to face their fears - and find fun along the way. With persistence you can overcome your fears… and sharing your feelings is the start of a solution

programme.title: Paper Plate
programme.desc: Simple yet the possibilities are endless, Hepi and Briko surprise us with their ideas

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Bottle Cap
programme.desc: Small yet that doesnt stop our DIY geniuses from coming up with something fun

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: Superragoo!
programme.desc: The twins and Ragoo come to a house in which objects speak. They are very concerned because Tim, the young master, is still asleep and must arrange the party for his birthday. Tim is awakened by Ragoo but, despite being late, he wants to do everything himself.

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: Fix it!
programme.desc: The twins visit a world where everything is falling apart, where they meet the frantic "fix-it team

programme.title: Harold's Missing Spoon
programme.desc: On a gusty day, Pancake has lost his favorite hat, and he’s looked EVERYWHERE, finally giving up and thinking maybe someone snatched it – Maple. The younger otter denies it (despite a history of “borrowing” stuff from Pancake and not putting any of it back), but Pancake doesn’t believe her. He goes to sleep thinking his little sister has his hat.When he arrives in the Zooniverse, he finds the Zoonicorns are in the midst of a Harold Crisis: the bear has lost one of his prized spoons!

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Afraid of the dark
programme.desc: In a northerly winter world, the twins meet a snowman who is afraid of the dark -- and too scared to travel through the night to enjoy the Northern Lights with his friends.

programme.title: Hokus croakus!
programme.desc: The twins make peace between a witch and a young girl whos been messing with her book of spells.

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: One of these days
programme.desc: The twins help a nervous Tortoise -whose only friend is a face drawn on a rock-to find the courage to make friends.

programme.title: XIA’S BAD DREAM
programme.desc: Xia becomes over-confident after he pulls off an impossible move invented by the Elders. But in his dreams, he keeps losing to mutants! April and Xia have to go into his nightmare and give him advice to conquer his dream enemies.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: Unlucky Fred
programme.desc: Fred relies on his lucky dice for every decision. At a theme park, he loses them, and has trouble coping without them. Along the way he also loses Friday! Fred has to rely on more than luck to get them both back.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: Too Many Bubbles
programme.desc: When Pancake eats too many bubbles from the Bubble Pond, he becomes super bouncy. Too much of anything isnt good.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: The Secret Book – Sleeping Beauty Case 2
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant, Fo, travel into the story of “The Sleeping Beauty”, having been called out by the three good fairies. The Prince has been turned to stone by a mysterious spell, just when he was about to reach the castle, where he would kiss her, thus waking her up. The three fairies have tried to break the spell with their magic wands, but to no avail. Sandra will soon discover that the culprit is the Evil Fairy, who gets her spells from a secret book. Only if they can get hold of that book will the three fairies be able to bring the Prince back to life. Plucking up all their courage, Sandra and Fo will enter the evil fairy’s sinister castle in search of the mysterious secret book.

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: Dusty Rides Again
programme.desc: When Fred’s mom’s vacuum breaks, Brains repairs and “improves” it, adding artificial intelligence, which turns him into a talking best friend for Friday. Dusty brings other appliances to life, and they try to lure Friday away from his human friends

programme.title: Smelly Princess
programme.desc: Brains must protect a space princess who has the ability to bend people to her will using her scent. While her political enemies try to steal her away, she tries to prove herself worthy of being a Protector.

programme.title: The Darkside Of The Sun
programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: No me rendiré
programme.desc: Ana lo pierde todo tras falsas acusaciones de asesinato de su marido. Embarazada, ella termina en la cárcel.

programme.title: No me rendiré
programme.desc: Ana lo pierde todo tras falsas acusaciones de asesinato de su marido. Embarazada, ella termina en la cárcel.

programme.title: No me rendiré
programme.desc: Ana lo pierde todo tras falsas acusaciones de asesinato de su marido. Embarazada, ella termina en la cárcel.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today

programme.title: NTD News Today

programme.title: Al Harmi Wal Abit
programme.desc: Director: Mohamed Mostafa - Cast:Khaled Elsawy / khaled Saleh / Rouby - Year of production:2013

programme.title: Samir Abo Elnile
programme.desc: Director: Amr Arafa - Cast:Ahmed Meky - Nechole Saba - Year of production:2013

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: After surviving the Great Depression and World War II, America entered an idyllic age, The Atomic Age, where wholesome values and classic Americana were king. Dads could work in a factory and afford to send his kids to college. Moms could stay at home. And families could afford homes in newly emerging suburbia. Life was home baked chocolate chip cookies. Simple and good. However, 50s America was also a time of heinous crimes. The emerging media of television shined its light on all sorts of cruel and inhuman acts warfare, riots, segregation, and a new awareness psychopathic, serial killers.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: There was a golden age of female serial killers in the U.S. and Europe. Female serial killers that targeted their children, husbands, and other family members. This was a time when women were becoming educated but had very little control over their lives. As a result they had very little recourse or legal remedies if they found themselves in a bad marriage or untenable domestic situation, a solution was to 'free themselves' by poisoning their husbands, or anyone controlling their lives and even killing their children.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: Theres been a long-held belief in the public that serial killing is largely an American phenomenon. That America, with its large faceless urban centers, street prostitution, poor and neglected inner cities, drug problems, and homelessness, is not only a unique breeding ground for murdering psychopaths but has created a ready-made victim pool for serial killers. Now we know serial killing has no boundaries.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: 21st-century America is a technological wonder: cell phones, internet, 24 hour news media, DNA breakthroughs, people on the move, amd expanding urban centers. But many of the old problems remain: drug addiction, homelessness, prostitution, poverty, gangs, murder, and serial killing. Starting in the 1990s serial killing in America has transitioned and adapted to the changing world, while at the same time in many ways staying the same. What has changed: There is new forensic technology particularly DNA analysis, better cooperation between law-enforcement jurisdictions, increasing awareness and fascination in the media and on the Internet with the serial killer.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: Prior to the true crime explosion, psychologists, and criminal investigators thought they had the serial killer figured out. But it turns out the answers are much more complex and troubling. Even the profile of the typical serial killer has changed dramatically. It is a change in the profile of who serial killers are and why they kill. It is a change that will send chills up your spine.

programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: Greek Mirthology 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is trying to get his nephews to eat their spinach, so he tells them about how Hercules (Popeye) defeated a bully (Bluto). Hercules gets his strength by sniffing garlic; he wins numerous tests of strength against the bully until the bully spots him sniffing garlic. The bully pulls out a handy bottle of chlorophyll and douses the garlic, disabling Hercules. He then knocks him into a field of spinach where Hercules discovers a new and better source of strength.

programme.title: Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.title: Superman cartoons 5
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 5

programme.title: The Draft Horse 1942
programme.desc: A farm horse tries to enlist in the army, but despite his virtuoso display of wartime histrionics, he's rejected when he flunks the physical. Dejected, he wanders into a mock battlefield, which tells him what war is really like.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Private Snafu; Volume 1-1943
programme.desc: Introducing Private Snafu, the nation's worst soldier and his various versions in different branches of the armed forces

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: A Car Tune Portrait -1937
programme.desc: A Car Tune Portrait -1937

programme.title: I'm in the Army Now 1936
programme.desc: To impress Olive, Bluto and Popeye try to convince an Army recruiter to sign him up.

programme.title: Road to Bali 1952
programme.desc: Two unemployed show-biz pals accept treasure-diving work in Bali for a local princess and they find treasure, love and trouble

programme.title: The Vagabond- 1916
programme.desc: Charlie, the emotional violinist, flees to a gipsy camp, only to find himself playing for an abducted girl. Soon, a unique birthmark will pave the way for an unexpected rescue and a marvellous new life. But, will she forget him so easily?

programme.title: Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet 1959; Season 8; Episode 11; Rick Gets Even
programme.desc: A beautiful girl breaks a dance date with Rick

programme.title: The Gorilla 1939
programme.desc: When a wealthy man is threatened by a killer known as The Gorilla, he hires the Ritz Brothers to investigate. A real escaped gorilla shows up at the mansion just as the investigators arrive.

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
Judge Roy Bean S1E29 Bad Medicine
programme.desc: Judge Bean suspects that Doc Malone's Medicine Show may be harboring a notorious killer.

programme.title: Boot Hill Bandits 1942
programme.desc: Shady town businessman Bolton seems to be the leader of the gang but even he takes his order from a higher authority who may have tried to take Marshal Corrigan's life

programme.title: The San Antonio Kid 1944
programme.desc: Red Ryder tries to expose murderous crooks who are terrorizing ranchers into selling their land because they contain secret oil-rich deposits.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill 1958
programme.desc: A cowboy escapes from jail with the help of his girlfriend, and goes after the men he believes are responsible for his brother being shot down by lawmen.

programme.title: The Drifter 1932
programme.desc: A man known as The Drifter returns home to his cabin in the woods and winds up getting involved with an escaped convict, a gunfighter, lumber company rivals, mysterious family ties and murder.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol 1951
programme.desc: In A Christmas Carol, Alastair Sim delivers a definitive performance as Ebenezer Scrooge, the miser whose icy heart is thawed by a haunting Christmas Eve journey. Visited by the ghost of Jacob Marley and the three Spirits of Christmas, Scrooge is forced to confront his past, witness the struggles of the present, and glimpse the bleak future awaiting him if he does not change. With atmospheric direction, powerful performances, and a timeless message of redemption, this beloved adaptation brings Charles Dickens’ classic tale to life in unforgettable fashion.

programme.title: The Great Commandment 1939
programme.desc: In The Great Commandment, a stirring tale of faith and sacrifice unfolds in the days of Roman-occupied Judea. When young Joel defies his father’s wishes and joins the Zealots in their fight against tyranny, he soon encounters a teacher whose message of love and forgiveness changes his path forever. Blending history, drama, and spiritual awakening, this powerful film explores the struggle between violence and compassion—and the timeless call to live by the greatest commandment of all.

programme.title: Santa Claus 1959
programme.desc: In Santa Claus, the holiday takes a surreal and magical turn in this colorful fantasy from Mexico. As Christmas Eve approaches, Santa battles the schemes of a mischievous demon sent by the Devil to ruin the season for children everywhere. With the help of Merlin the wizard, a loyal band of helpers, and his magical workshop in the sky, Santa must outwit evil and deliver joy to the world. Whimsical, strange, and utterly unique, this cult holiday classic blends wonder, morality, and a touch of the bizarre into a Christmas tale like no other.

programme.title: A Shriek In The Night
programme.desc: Pat Morgan and Ted Kord are rival newspaper reporters always trying to outscoop each other. They join together to solve a series of murders being committed in an apartment building.

programme.title: Corregidor
programme.desc: A doctor and his staff in a hospital on the Philippine island of Corregidor shortly after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor try to treat the sick, injured and wounded as American and Filipino troops desperately try to beat back a ferocious Japanese attack.

programme.title: Mad Dog Morgan
programme.desc: The true story of Irish outlaw Daniel Morgan, who is wanted, dead or alive, in Australia during the 1850s.

programme.title: The Cowboy and the Bandit 1935
programme.desc: In The Cowboy and the Bandit, Rex Lease saddles up for action in a fast-paced tale of loyalty, lawlessness, and frontier justice. When a notorious outlaw’s fate collides with that of an honest cowboy, the line between friend and foe blurs as danger closes in. Packed with hard-riding chases, six-gun showdowns, and plenty of Western grit, this classic delivers thrills where the open range meets the outlaw trail.

programme.title: Arizona
programme.desc: Perrin is a cowboy who comes to the aid of local Indians being swindled out of their gold. He signs on as a ranch foreman, but learns the ranch is the home of the crooks.

programme.title: Hit The Saddle
programme.desc: Greedy rancher McGowan wants to have a local wild horse sanctuary closed, so he can capture and sell them while Tucson tries to break up Stony's marriage to a sexy, gold-digging saloon girl.

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde Starring John Barrymore
programme.desc: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

programme.title: Mitchell (1975 color)
programme.desc: A tough, slobby, honest cop tries to simultaneously take down heroin dealers and a corrupt businessman who murdered a burglar, even if it costs him his life.

programme.title: Peter Pan (1924) Colorized
programme.desc: Peter Pan enters the nursery of the Darling children and, with the help of fairy dust, leads them off to Never Never Land, where they meet the nefarious Captain Hook.

programme.title: The Invincible Kung Fu Legs
programme.desc: Tan, a Northern Chinese kung fu expert, kills a man using his lethal bootwork in self defense. He is then hired to train a bratty princess and her servant in kung fu. In the meantime, the brother of the man Tan killed is out for revenge and he'll get him at any cost.

programme.title: Return of the Kung Fu Dragon
programme.desc: Golden City, capital of wondrous Phoenix island, is attacked by an evil despot and his sorcerer ally and conquered, with the Emperor and his three generals killed by the invaders

programme.title: Fearless Hyena
programme.desc: A young man whose sickly grandfather has taught him a secret form of Kung Fu, starts to make a living off of his unique fighting style, only to attract the attention of his grandfather's mortal enemy.

programme.title: The Black Rebels
programme.desc: Damon's in black-face as blacks take on whites who take on Hispanics in this very entertaining teenage gang war extravaganza. Teenage punks slice and dice each other, turn innocent young girls into sleazy tramps, threaten innocent citizens, get involved in interracial romance, and sell drugs to local citizens. Whew! That's a lotta trashy behavior for one movie.

programme.title: Commandos
programme.desc: During World War II, an Italian-American commando outfit disguised as an Italian Army unit is parachuted behind Axis lines in North Africa.

programme.title: Black Cobra
programme.desc: Eva comes to Hong Kong. Seeing Eva perform with a snake, Judas gets interested in her. He showers her with gifts. She moves in with him and his snakes. Things get grim.

programme.title: Bonanza - S1E19: The Gunmen
programme.desc: Hoss and Little Joe are mistaken for bloodthirsty hired killers in a small Texas town dominated by two feuding families.

programme.title: Custer
programme.desc: In 1868, after the Civil War, Custer takes charge of a mix of ex-Confederates and criminals, the 7th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Hays, Kansas. His boss General Terry doesn't like his methods or his long blond hair, but he manages to keep fighting the Sioux (the series ends the year before the Little Big Horn)

programme.title: Research Unit
programme.desc: Flavie celebra cumpleaños con amigos y amante. Despierta atada a silla con al cuerpo de su pareja, muerto.

programme.title: Research Unit
programme.desc: Agustín muere ahogado en puerto donde esperaba a su hermana biológica.

programme.title: Research Unit
programme.desc: Guardia de seguridad muere tras celebrar contrato indefinido, pero sorprende al renunciar antes del evento.

programme.title: Research Unit
programme.desc: Jet privado aterriza de emergencia con dos muertos, un piloto herido y una superviviente: Leslie.

programme.title: Research Unit
programme.desc: Hallan cuerpo de Déborah Watts, fotógrafa. Su estudio revela una doble vida, pero era madre y esposa.

programme.title: Winning Of The West
programme.desc: One of a bunch of gangsters trying to push the old protection racket on western ranchers turns out to be Gene's younger brother.

programme.title: Billy The Kid Returns
programme.desc: After Pat Garrett kills Billy the Kid, Billy's look-alike Roy Rogers arrives and is mistaken for him. Although a murderer, Billy was on the side of the homesteaders against the large ranchers. As Billy's death is unknown, Roy gets Garrett to let him pose as Billy to continue the fight, but without the killing.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Running from the law after a bank robbery in Mexico, Dad Longworth finds an opportunity to take the stolen gold and leave his partner Rio to be captured. Years later, Rio escapes from the prison where he has been since, and hunts down Dad for revenge. Dad is now a respectable sheriff in California, and has been living in fear of Rio's return.

programme.title: Guest Kel Mitchell
programme.desc: Kel Mitchell is famous for making Good Burger and starring on Kenan and Kel but his life in comedy also includes a life in the church. He’s a youth pastor. The church helped him survive a very difficult time in his life where he thought about ending it all. This is a deep convo about his spirituality and his comedy.

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Portland Rocks!
programme.desc: A full rack of BBQ ribs that are 100% plant-based and delicious! Seitan is the secret in Portland!

programme.title: The Most Intense Demonstration Ever
programme.desc: Follow along with Direct Action Everywhere as hundreds invade the San Francisco Ferry Building!

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Asheville's Good Vibes!
programme.desc: Asheville, known for beer and good vibes. Now, add plant-based deliciousness to it.

programme.title: Sleaford Mods' Vegan Musician
programme.desc: Andrew Fearn is a member of the popular and controversial UK band Sleaford Mods.

programme.title: The Secret Reason We Eat Meat
programme.desc: Wouldn't you like to know?

programme.title: Trying Vegan With Mario - How Not to Die
programme.desc: How Not to Die: The Groundbreaking Bestseller Transforming Health and Nutrition

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Oh Canada... Yum!
programme.desc: Vancouver has a happening vegan scene. Delish food and - in the summer - this island is paradise!

programme.title: Highway to Health - Kevin Smith at Crossroads LA
programme.desc: Famed actor/director Kevin Smith reveals how he went vegan after almost dying of a heart attack.

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Mouthwatering Eats in Minneapolis
programme.desc: So many delicious foods from Minneapolis. Try the vegan meats that make Minneapolis a vegan hotspot!

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Tour San Diego's Food Scene!
programme.desc: San Diego is one of the coolest cities in America, it's California's second biggest city, after LA.

programme.title: The Devil's Fairground
programme.desc: Starring Justin Duncan, Gerald Crum, Mercedes Peterson and John Charles Dickson. The Stars of two competing and colliding paranormal television shows converge on an abandoned haunted amusement park which ends up being the epicenter to hell. They are now all trapped - in an all out war against pure evil...

programme.title: Whisper
programme.desc: A young Nurse is assigned to look after a patient in a remote location in the English countryside. As the night continues she finds herself terrorized by an unseen force that is connected with her patient...

programme.title: Ouija Hosts
programme.desc: Presenters of paranormal TV show "Ghost Hosts" are filming in an abandoned haunted building as part of a Halloween special. The stories surrounding the horrifying ghosts of the mansion are about to become reality...

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: El Culto de Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: Un grupo de adolescentes con problemas y su maestra deben luchar por sobrevivir después de descubrir que una secta ha devuelto la vida a Humpty Dumpty, un muñeco asesino, y lo ha liberado en el campamento en el que se encuentran...

programme.title: El Bosque del Diablo
programme.desc: Rachel y su equipo de cineastas viajan a Transilvania, Rumania, para documentar los fenómenos paranormales en el bosque de Hoia-Baciu...

programme.title: El Ultimo Cartucho
programme.desc: Dos hermanos pistoleros enemigos de las injusticias se reúnen una vez más para salvar una tribu de nativos americanos a los cuales les quieren quitar sus tierras y despojarlos de todas sus pertenencias.

programme.title: Calladas Por La Mafia
programme.desc: Un grupo de mujeres son secuestradas y son retenidas ala fuerza y una casería toma dimensiones inesperadas logran escapar del infierno y cobran venganza contra ellos.

programme.title: Borrar de la Memoria
programme.desc: Una historia de amor se transforma en una historia de persecuciones y asesinatos sin esclarecer en el contexto de la masacre estudiantil de octubre de 1968. Más de 40 años después, un periodista tenaz se da a la tarea de aclarar los crímenes bajo condiciones muy peligrosas, con el objetivo de llevar la verdad ante la justicia. Ello representa un esfuerzo dedicado a obligar a un país a reconocer la negación de la reconciliación y el cierre de trágicos acontecimientos políticos y sociales en su historia.

programme.title: Amar
programme.desc: Carlos quiere pero Susana no. Joel no quiere pero Patricia lo obliga. Gabriel lo espera pero Martha no se lo da. Amado lo busca con una gringa y lo pierde. Benito lo tiene toda la vida. Concha se lo lleva más allá del sistema solar. Todos lo quieren y todos lo dan pero unos no lo reciben y otros quieren más. Así es Amar.

programme.title: Expediente 53 3.0
programme.desc: Un extraño ser del más allá regresa con sed de venganza para acabar con todas las personas que lo han estado atormentando por todos estos años, decidiendo poseer a Jack y darle más fuerza a Baal.

programme.title: El Duende
programme.desc: Rosalía se muda a la ciudad junto a su hijo pequeño, Ramiro. Con la ayuda de una conocida, consigue encontrar vivienda. La casa ha estado cerrada por décadas, y tiene un horno antiguo. Lo que Rosalía ignora es que dentro del horno habita un duende que tiene por costumbre robar niños.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: Cutting Room
programme.desc: In “Cutting Room,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that our situation might be bigger than us, but it’s not bigger than our God.

programme.title: Now What?
programme.desc: In “Now What?,” Pastor Holly Furtick explains that the outcome of your story is determined by how you respond to the problem — so stay present and see what God does next.

programme.title: OFF MENU
programme.desc: In “OFF MENU,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though we might not feel ready for this season of our lives, God has already prepared us for the exact assignment that we are designed to accomplish.

programme.title: A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing
programme.desc: In “A Steady Hand For A Sudden Blessing,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that even when we don’t see God moving, His hand still holds us steadily.

programme.title: Dig Until God Does
programme.desc: It will flow when it’s supposed to. In “Dig Until God Does,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to plant seeds of faith in the dry seasons of our lives until God brings the rain.
